evidence.claim: Guardian Nurses likely aligns with HIPAA regulations due to their healthcare advocacy services.
The company uses FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
Guardian Nurses emphasizes data security on their services page, highlighting compliance with healthcare regulations.
The website discusses partnerships with EHR systems, indicating integration with health tech platforms.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or API automation in their offerings.
